name: UncodedRadio
0:
”Alexa, open uncoded radio”
”Alexa, start uncoded radio”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: uncoded radio
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Uncoded Radio skill allows you to listen to your favorite electronic radio station, Uncoded Radio, directly on your Alexa-enabled device. Immerse yourself in the world of electronic music with a diverse lineup featuring renowned DJs from around the globe. Whether you're relaxing at home, working out, or hosting a party, Uncoded Radio provides the perfect soundtrack for your day.

Features:

Streaming: Start streaming Uncoded Radio's audio by simply saying "Alexa, open Uncoded Radio."
Voice Control: Control playback using simple voice commands such as "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, stop."
Eclectic Programming: Enjoy a variety of musical genres, exclusive mixes, and live DJ sets to cater to all tastes and moods.
24/7: Access electronic music anytime, anywhere, with Uncoded Radio's continuous streaming.
Dive into the vibrant world of electronic music with the Uncoded Radio skill and let yourself be carried away by captivating rhythms and electrifying sounds, available on your Alexa device now.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
